casebody.data:
PUBLIC EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT SYSTEM OF MISSISSIPPI, petitioner,
v.
INDYMAC MBS, INC., et al. No. 13-640. Supreme Court of the United States March 10, 2014. Case below, Police and Fire Retirement System of City of Detroit v. IndyMac MBS, Inc., 721 F.3d 95 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit granted.
